name: OUCH! Mag #27
description:
Oops! All games! 

Wow, Imagine that! A couple video games on itch.io, who woulda thought!

Two, small, weird games, one by myself and one by Elijah Cauley of Crawl Space Studio fame! Check out Eli's other work at crawlspacestudio.itch.io and on twitter @small_signs
